item.title: Rare earth stocks tumble as U.S. expects China to delay export controls
item.description: Shares of U.S.-listed rare earth miners fell on Monday as U.S. officials said they expect China to delay introducing export controls on critical miner...

item.title: Trump says he underwent an MRI examination
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump said on Monday he had undergone an MRI examination, without saying why.

item.title: Trump to meet China's Xi for the first time in second term as trade deal remains elusive
item.description: The confirmation of a Trump-Xi meeting signaled an intent to de-escalate tensions and put negotiations back on track, analysts said.

item.title: Trump Treasury Sec. Bessent says he's felt 'pain' from China because he's a 'soybean farmer'
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent's estimated hundreds and millions of dollars in wealth includes soybean and corn farmland in North Dakota.

item.title: U.S. and China talks sketch out rare earths, tariff pause for Trump and Xi to consider
item.description: Top Chinese and U.S. officials hashed out the framework of a trade deal for Trump and Xi to decide on later this week.
